FuncDef: The display debugging mpls ldp command displays information about all configured LDP debugging functions.
Examples: LDP_SESSION job debugging switch is on
LDP_SESSION error debugging switch is on
LDP_SESSION events debugging switch is on
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
After you enable the LDP debugging functions and configure filtering policies, run the display debugging mpls ldp command to view information about all configured LDP debugging functions. The command output helps you check whether the debugging functions and the filtering policies are configured successfully.
